smart_goals.description: By June 30, 2023, decrease my HbA1c from 9.2 to 7.0.
By May 31, 2023, increase my daily step count to 10,000 steps per day.
By July 31, 2023, reduce my daily sodium intake to less than 2,300 milligrams.
By August 31, 2023, increase my daily fruit and vegetable intake to 5 servings per day.
By September 30, 2023, maintain my BMI within a healthy range of 18.5 to 24.9.
By October 31, 2023, limit my daily added sugar intake to no more than 30 grams per day.
By November 30, 2023, consume at least 30 grams of fiber per day.
By December 31, 2023, aim for at least 7 hours of sleep per night.
By January 31, 2024, engage in at least 150 minutes of moderate-intensity aerobic activity per week.
By February 28, 2024, maintain a regular exercise routine of at least 30 minutes per day, 5 days per week.
